SEARCH
Package io.github.gorpong.hoursexport

Class ConfigProperties

java.lang.Object
io.github.gorpong.hoursexport.ConfigProperties
public class ConfigProperties extends Object
The properties file configuration controlling how the project works. It used to look for the file in the class path, but once converted to a Maven project, that no longer worked, so just added the ability to pass in the argument on the command line and look for the default file in the current working directory. Not as useful as a full class-path search, but at least this works.
Author:
Gordon Galligher - gorpong@gmail.com

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigProperties

  • Method Details

    • getPropValues

      public void getPropValues(String propFileName) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Get the property values from the specified properties file somewhere in the classpath. Read through all the entries and build a private HashMap of key/value pairs. This can then be used in the getConfig method to get at the actual value associated with that information.
      Parameters:
      propFileName - Name of property file to parse (defaults to defPropFname)
      Throws:
      IOException - Problem closing/writing file
      FileNotFoundException - Can't find properties file

    • getPropValues

      public void getPropValues() throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Get the property values from the properties file that is the default for the program. Really, just call the other constructor with the default file name attribute.
      Throws:
      IOException - Problem closing/writing file
      FileNotFoundException - Can't find properties file

    • getConfig

      public String getConfig(String key)
      Get the configuration entry pointed at by key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to lookup in the configuration database
      Returns:
      The value associated with that key (or null if not found)

    • getConfig

      public String getConfig(String key, String defVal)
      Get the configuration entry pointed at by key, or default if not present.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to lookup in the configuration database
      defVal - The default value to return, if key isn't found.
      Returns:
      The value associated with that key (or default)

    • setConfig

      public void setConfig(String key, String value)
      Set a configuration entry with the specified key and value.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to set in the configuration database
      value - The value to set for the specified key

    • saveProperties

      public void saveProperties(String propFileName) throws IOException
      Save the properties to the specified properties file.
      Parameters:
      propFileName - Name of property file to save (defaults to defPropFname)
      Throws:
      IOException - Problem closing/writing file

    • saveProperties

      public void saveProperties() throws IOException
      Save the properties to the default properties file, only if it was a file.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - Request to save when it was found on the classpath
      IOException - Problem closing/writing file
